Uses of Class
com.boslott.model.Customer

Packages that use Customer
Package Description
com.boslott.DataAccess  

  • Uses of Customer in com.boslott.DataAccess

    Methods in com.boslott.DataAccess that return Customer
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Customer CustomerDAO.findCustomer​(int id)
    Gets the data from the data source for one Customer with the customerID id
    Customer UCertdbCustomerDAO.findCustomer​(int id)
    Gets a single Customer entry from the UCertify database with the customerID property value of the given id
    Customer CustomerDAO.findCustomerByName​(java.lang.String name)
    Gets the data from the data source for one Customer with the customerName name
    Customer UCertdbCustomerDAO.findCustomerByName​(java.lang.String name)
    Gets a single Customer entry from the UCertify database that has the customerName property value of the given String name
    Methods in com.boslott.DataAccess that return types with arguments of type Customer
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.util.ArrayList<Customer> CustomerDAO.findAllCustomers​(java.lang.Boolean refetch)
    Gets all Customer data from the data source.
    java.util.ArrayList<Customer> UCertdbCustomerDAO.findAllCustomers​(java.lang.Boolean refetch)
    Gets all Customer objects from the local ArrayList or calls the private class method to get all Customer objects from the UCertify database.
    Methods in com.boslott.DataAccess with parameters of type Customer
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.lang.Boolean CustomerDAO.insertCustomer​(Customer newCustomer)
    Inserts a new Customer entry into the data source with data from the newCustomer object
    java.lang.Boolean UCertdbCustomerDAO.insertCustomer​(Customer newCustomer)
    Inserts a new Customer entry into the UCertify database with the property values of those contained in the newCustomer object (except the customerID)
    java.lang.Boolean CustomerDAO.updateCustomer​(Customer custToUpdate)
    Updates an existing Customer entry in the data source, updated with data from the custToUpdate object
    java.lang.Boolean UCertdbCustomerDAO.updateCustomer​(Customer custToUpdate)
    Updates a Customer entry in the UCertify database with the property values of those contained in the custToUpdate object
